data.title: HUGE slices
data.text: I didn't realize how big a slice was and I ordered two. Really delicious, but I could only eat one. I wish this place was open on the weekends!

data.title: I LOVE this place
data.text: This place caters to the kids at school across the street as well as the general neighborhood. Where else can you get a large slice of pizza for $1.75? Their wings are great, their sandwiches enormous and everything is incredibly cheap. When I was visiting my kids in November I went every day for a slice. When I was back in Dec/Jan I only got to go twice, but I was in heaven. Gourmet pizza? No, but new york style cheesy slice with pepper flakes and extra oregano= yum!
